insert into board(brd_no, brd_writer_no, brd_title, brd_content, brd_cate_no) values(#{brdNo}, #{brdWriterNo}, #{brdTitle}, #{brdContent}, #{brdCateNo})

mapper.select: select b.brd_no, b.brd_writer_no, b.brd_title, b.brd_content, b.brd_views, b.brd_created_at, i.img_path, c.brd_cate_name, d.address_no, d.mem_no, d.address_si, d.address_gu, d.address_dong, m.cmt_content, m.cmt_writer_no, m.cmt_no, m.cmt_brd_no from BOARD b left join BOARD_IMAGE i on b.brd_no = i.brd_no left join BOARD_CATEGORY c on b.brd_cate_no = c.brd_cate_no left join ADDRESS d on b.brd_writer_no = d.mem_no left join COMMENTS m on b.brd_no = m.cmt_brd_no where b.brd_no=#{brdNo}
